eekayi awula.eekayi hamudawa athin waradi una kiyala piliganna hitha denne naththe.apakshapathiwa balanawa nan kisima siwil wasiyekta hani nowi yuddhyak kala kiyana eka mona pol buruwektawath piliganna puluwan deyak nemeyi.me widiyowa ena kam kisima waradak api kale naha kiyalayi hitiye.waradi una kiyala awankawa piligena ehema waradi kala ayata daduwam dena winiwida penena yanthranayak api thiyagaththa nan meka mechchara prashnayak wenne naha.oya ugath padam prathisandhana komisama kiyala atawala thiyena eka boruwak kiyana eka mayiyath dannawa apith dannawa hodatama.eeka ara eepiaarsi wage loketa boruwa dan atawapu boruwak.ara rosena chanukawa marapu ekata dapu komisame ripot ekata wada wadi deyak ooken wenne naha.batahira witharak nemeyi manawa himikam gana kilutu nathi kirthimath warthawak thiyana arundathi roy desmand tutu wage minissu me gana monawada kiyanne kiyala tikak hithala balanna.ada api demala ayata salakana hati harida kiyala hithala balanna.uthure hama minissu 50 tama eka hamuda bhataya gane dagena ee minissunge dainika hamadema hamudawen palanaya karanne.mewa harida kiyala hithala balanna.dayasporawa jathiwadi thamayi.ayi ee?dayasporawa kotinge waradi dakinne naha.ee wagema mayiyalath jathiwadiyi.mayiyala thamunge paththe waradi dakinne naha.me widihata inna kan kawadawath api degolla athara sanhidiyawak athi wenne naha.
